section.heading: Rules.
section.text: Within 90 days after enactment of this subchapter, the Mayor shall issue rule to implement and enforce the provisions of this subchapter pursuant to Chapter 5 of Title 2.

annoGroup.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
annoGroup.annotation: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 540-1507.01.

annoGroup.heading: Resolutions
annoGroup.annotation: Resolution 16-352, the “International Registration Plan Enforcement Rulemaking Disapproval Resolution of 2005”, was approved effective November 1, 2005.
